title: Fight ends with innocent child being shot
content:
MEMPHIS, TN (WMC) -
Two men are in jail after a child was shot in Frayser.
The shooting happened over the weekend at the Ridgecrest Apartments on Range Line Road.
Investigators said Eric Payton and Rommell Turner got into a fight at the apartment complex. Payton pulled out a gun and shot into a crowd of people.
A child in the crowd was hit with the bullet. The child was taken to the hospital in non-critical condition.
